# Welcome!

This is a peer reviewed academic journal geared towards nurturing the upcoming scientist with a focus on Anesthesiology and Critical Care Medicicne. It is hosted by the Kenya Society of Anesthesiologists (KSA) and Critical Care Society of Kenya (CCSK).
